verbs.description: [ARG1: pittsburgh chemistry teacher] [V: found] [ARGM-PRD: dead] [ARGM-LOC: in school] [ARGM-PRD: a chemistry teacher] [ARGM-LOC: at pittsburgh student achievement center] was found unresponsive and pronounced dead at the school monday morning jonathan tyler 62 of pittsburgh was found unresponsive by a co - worker in a space designated for teachers at the school in homewood according to a statement from pittsburgh public schools spokeswoman ebony pugh the cause of death has not been determined a report from the allegheny county medical examiner school allegheny county westinghouse high school pittsburgh pittsburgh westinghouse high school homewood pittsburgh student achievement center jonathan tyler student achievement center pittsburgh public schools ebony pugh teacher
